mapper.select: select * from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_items) */ rownum rn, itemcode, itemname, price, quantity, ratings, category, purchases, regdate, thumbnail from tbl_items where category like '%'||#{category}||'%' and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} order by regdate desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}

select * from ( select itemcode, itemname, price, quantity, ratings, category, purchases, regdate, thumbnail from tbl_items where quantity > 0 and purchases is not null order by purchases desc ) where rownum <= 6
select count(itemCode) from tbl_items where category like '%'||#{category}||'%'
